title: Crime Alert 09.26.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.26.19
description:
Florida school resource officer fired after arresting/handcuffing a 6 year-old. Mom under arrest after helping her daughter assault another student. Woman tells cops she has meth in her "felony bag."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
